LLNL RtD TemplateÔÉÅ

This documentation site and the files associated with the .github repo are designed to be used as a template for developers who are new to Read the Docs (RtD) documentation.

Contents:

  • Steps for Setting up Docs
    • 1. Create Repo/Directory
    • 2. Install Sphinx
    • 3. Build and Configure Doc Files
    • 4. Establish Webhook Integration
    • 5. Create and Populate .rst Files
  • Contribute to Existing Docs
    • Install requirements.txt
    • Build Docs Locally
    • When Finished Editing
  • Documentation Resources

Note

This site is running Sphinx v2.0.1 but downgraded to Docutils v0.16 for sphinx_rtd_theme. Docutils v0.17 has a bug in which bulleted (unordered) lists are not rendered properly.
